item.description:
Hello Coffee Talkers,

***Please purchase tickets prior to meeting at the Barnes and Noble** as this is opening week end and the movie starts at 7 pm.  To avoid the movie being sold out and not getting in, please be sure to purchase tickets well in advance.  I plan on buying my tickets prior to our coffee event that is at 6 pm at the Barnes & Noble.

Please join me for some coffee and dessert in the Starbucks Cafe at the Barnes and Noble Booksellers in North Haven, CT at 6 pm and then we will head over to the movie to see "OZ - The Great And Powerful" at 6:45 pm.  This  looks great, it is an adaptation of the "Wizard of Oz". The movie appears to have great cinematography, an all star cast and looks like a fun fantasy, adventure movie.

Coffee Location and Time: 6pm - Starbucks Cafe at the Barnes & Noble in North Haven, CT

Movie Location and Time: 7pm - Rave Motion Pictures, North Haven, CT  ***Movie starts at 7 pm, so please be sure to buy tickets in advance or before meeting me for coffee at 6 pm.  We will head over to the movie at 6:45 pm.***

Cheers,

Swadhi
item.how_to_find_us: At the Barnes & Noble Starbucks Cafe section***Please buy tickets prior to meeting me for coffee and we will head over to the movie promptly at 6:45pm since the movie starts at 7pm.***
item.name: Coffee Talk at "OZ The Great and Powerful" * Please Buy Tickets before Event
